DOC.brief_summary: Prospective randomised controlled trial: 3 IUI cycles versus 1 IVF/ICSI cycle in women aged 38-42 years.
DOC.brief_title: IUI vs. IVF/ICSI in Women Aged 38-42 Years: a Prospective Randomized Controlled Trial.
DOC.detailed_description: Study design: Prospective randomised controlled trial: 3 IUI cycles versus 1 IVF/ICSI cycle in women aged 38-42 years. . Group 1: 3 consecutive gonadotrophin stimulated IUI cycles (Follitropine Bèta, Puregon, MSD). vs. Group 2: 1 IVF/ ICSI cycle - Recombinant FSH (Follitropine Bèta, Puregon, MSD) - Antagonist protocol.
DOC.criteria: Women aged between 38 and 42 years. Sperm: use of donor sperm or husband sperm reaching WHO criteria 2010. Tubal infertility (even one tube). Major uterine or ovarian abnormalities Metabolic abnormalities
